mapper.select: SELECT menu_id AS "MENU_ID" ,menu_nm AS "MENU_NM" ,up_menu_id AS "UP_MENU_ID" ,level AS "LEVEL" ,path AS "PATH" FROM sys_menu_mgt WHERE up_menu_id LIKE 'M_MAIN%' ORDER BY level, order_no
SELECT TITLE AS "title", DATE AS "date" FROM NEWS
SELECT TITLE AS "title", DATE AS "date" FROM INQUIRYLIST
